info.name: STA Backend API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for Student Team Activity Backend

Test Users:
- Admin: NRP: Admin, Password: password123, Role: SUPER_ADMIN
- Dosen1: NRP: Dosen1, Password: password123, Role: DOSEN (create manually)
- Student: NRP: 2272001, Password: password123, Role: MAHASISWA (create manually)

variable.description: Course ID (from GET /api/courses) - Returns ARRAY of groups

request.description:
üìã LIST ALL groups in a course

Returns ARRAY with: id, nama, kapasitas, totalAnggota, status, totalRequest, totalKontribusi

Response has pagination.

variable.description: Group ID (from previous 'List Groups' response) - Returns SINGLE group object

request.description:
üìñ GET SINGLE group details with members

Returns SINGLE OBJECT (not array) with: id, nama, deskripsi, kapasitas, anggota[], status, totalKontribusi

No pagination. Use Group ID here, NOT Course ID!

üë§ GET user's contributions and activity in a specific group

Returns: mahasiswa info, kontribusi by thread, aktivitas log

variable.description: Course ID where this group belongs

request.description:
‚ûï CREATE new study group

Required: kapasitas
Optional: nama, deskripsi, idMahasiswa[], status

Returns: created group with totalKontribusi: 0

‚úèÔ∏è UPDATE existing group

All fields optional: nama, deskripsi, status, kapasitas, idMahasiswa[]

üóëÔ∏è DELETE study group

Deletes group and all associated members
